channel.title: Posts on Darshan Crout
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Darshan Crout

item.title: Generate YouTube Titles Using Image Captioning
item.description: I watch a lot of YouTube. In fact a lot of younger people watch more YouTube then they do television. If you’re like me, YouTube not only acts as an endless source of entertainment but it also serves as a source of knowledge and information. The platform has videos on just about anything, from how to make fermented food, cracking the Sega Saturn, and Joe Rogan interviewing himself. However, if you’ve been on the platform as long as I have, you have probably realized by now certain patterns in how YouTubers structure their content.

item.title: Building a Site Using Hugo
item.description: As of late, I’ve been getting interested in software philosophies such as the Unix philosophy and Suckless, hoping that they will provide me with some guidance on how to become a better programmer. I’ve also been wanting to redo my personal blog for quite some time, but never did because I would always get bogged down on choosing a theme. While browsing for site themes, I came across Simple Hugo Theme which is a Hugo theme inspired by http://bettermotherfuckingwebsite.
